column4: My Firefox is consuming 25% CPU usage, anyone knows whats the problem is? (flash is not installed)
yes, propertary driver for ATI Radeon HD 5770... the cpu consumption is not only high in firefox, but also when i move around window in Ubuntu
are you sure that your ati drivers works? type glxinfo|grep DRI
nothing happens i i type that in terminal
type glxinfo and find if mesa or properiety drviers ati work
so you have properly installed ATI drivers, I don't have idea what is wrong
ati drivers sucks, i have 3 radeons and have always problem with ati drivers
how much is firefox / xorg consuming for you?
sorry, firefox is now compiling, I try user netbsd, and don't have ati, I sell my radeonhd 4850
is ATI always bad with linux?
ati is ok with open source drivers but opengl is slow
so where can i find the open source drivers?
search for radeonhd but I don't know if it have support for you card, check ubuntu repository for it or web
